titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Gravesend tax assessment roll 1974.063
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:17:36 +0000.

did.abstract: Tax assessment roll for the town of Gravesend in Kings County containing names of property owners, descriptions and values of their personal and real estates, and amount of tax applied to each individual. Dated 1799.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Gravesend tax assessment roll, 1974.063, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1974.
